revision.comment: Ketiltrout moved page [[Wartime Naval Armaments Supplement Programme (Japan, 1944)]] to [[Wartime Naval Armaments Supplement Programme]]: unneeded disambiguation
revision.text:
The {{nihongo|'''Wartime Naval Armaments Supplement Programme'''|マル戦計画, 昭和十八年度戦時艦艇建造計画|Maru Sen Keikaku, [[Shōwa period|Shōwa]]-Jūhachi-Nendo Senji Kantei-Kenzō Keikaku}} was the final armaments expansion plan of the [[Imperial Japanese Navy]] (IJN).
==Background== Early 1944, the IJN started building warships for war. The plan did not include any large warships which were suitable for offensive operations.
==Table of vessels== {| class="wikitable" width="90%" | width="12%" | '''Category''' | width="8%" | '''Class''' | width="8%" | '''Vessel number(s)''' | width="20%" | '''Completed''' | width="15%" | '''Converted''' | width="12%" | '''Cancelled''' |- | Military transporter 2nd class | ''[[No.101 class landing ship|No.101]]'' | #1501–1569 and 32 vessels | ''[[Japanese landing ship No.101|No.101]]'' and 68 vessels | 22 vessels were transferred to the [[Imperial Japanese Army|Army]]. | 32 vessels |- | Coast defence boat Type-A (steel) | ''[[No.1 class coast defence boat|No.1]]'' | #1701–1760 | | | |- | rowspan="2"|Minelayer | ''[[Kamishima class minelayer|Kamishima]]'' | #1801–1809 | ''[[Japanese minelayer Kamishima|Kamishima]]'' (#1801), ''[[Japanese minelayer Awashima|Awashima]]'' (#1802) | | #1803–1809 |- | ''[[Japanese minelayer Minoo|Minoo]]'' | #1821–1822 | ''Minoo'' (#1821) | | #1822 |- | Coast defence boat Type-B (wooden) | ''[[No.101 class coast defence boat|No.101]]'' | #1851–1870 | | | |- | Auxiliary subchaser | ''[[No.1 class auxiliary submarine chaser|Aux.
